title: News24.com | Global hunger could double due to coronavirus pandemic: UN
description: Covid-19 is likely to leave 130 million people acutely hungry this year, adding to 135 million already in the category, the United Nations World Food Programme says.
content:
The number of people facing acute food insecurity could nearly double this year to 265 million due to the economic fallout of Covid-19, according to the United Nations World Food Programme (WFP).
The impact of lost tourism revenues, falling remittances and t… [+3392 chars]
